reviewText: I had to return the item because it would not play on my dvd blue ray.  I got a refund.
We could  see the movie in the tradicional blu  ray  in our country although it was PAL system
DOES NOT PLAY ON AMERICAN DVD BLUE RAY PLAYERS - REGION A1 AS ADVERTISED - RIPPED OFF
The one star does not apply to the movie. I could not watch the movie because it does not play in Region A/1 blu-ray players despite having been advertised as doing so.
